block.p: EASTMAN KODAK CO., Rochester, named Ted Lewis senior vice president for digital business development. He had been president at DaimlerChrysler Research and Technology, a unit of DaimlerChrysler A.G.

HAWKS INDUSTRIES, New York, named Walter W. Tyler, president and chief executive at North Star Exploration, a subsidiary of Hawks, to the additional posts of president and chief executive at Hawks. He succeeds Nicholas Vanderborgh, who remains president at Blue Star Sustainable Technologies Corp., another subsidiary of Hawks.
EASTMAN KODAK CO., Rochester, named Ted Lewis senior vice president for digital business development. He had been president at DaimlerChrysler Research and Technology, a unit of DaimlerChrysler A.G.

HAWKS INDUSTRIES, New York, named Walter W. Tyler, president and chief executive at North Star Exploration, a subsidiary of Hawks, to the additional posts of president and chief executive at Hawks. He succeeds Nicholas Vanderborgh, who remains president at Blue Star Sustainable Technologies Corp., another subsidiary of Hawks.

SANGSTAT MEDICAL CORP., Fremont, Calif., named Jean-Jacques Bienaime, president and chief executive, to the additional post of chairman, succeeding Dr. Philippe Pouletty, who resigned to focus on Drug-Abuse Sciences, a company he founded.
